Reviews.Content: ive stayed lot hotels paris rest world dont mind staying shabby palces advertised priced standard time mom stay hotel nice choose hotel worst charged 254 euros breakfast 2 nights 4th floor morning late night tearing loose electrical wires etc cleaned concrete mixed god tiny bed fits nasty hell bed sheet night fierce rash result paid

Reviews.Title: “This is not a hotel, it is an overpriced hostel”
Reviews.Author: yayangie
Reviews.Content: friend booked hotel online horribly disappointed arrived overpriced hostel hotel phone lock door 2 girls traveling issue makeshift attic front desk worker available change dont rude beginning maybe dislike women talk customers respect courtesy im reason rude offered help carry luggage 8 flights spiral stairs attic maneuver piles towels sheets allover stairs feel safe welcome hotel hotel advertised refund hotel refused people advertise hotel lower prices beds horribly uncomfortable shower water pressure sheets blankets super piling tv size laptop screen positive note hotel located food nice shops recommend staying else

Reviews.Title: “Nice Hotel - Brilliant Location”
Reviews.Author: TravellingEballs
Reviews.Content: stayed hotel night 10 june 2010 double wc view previously stayed 2005 surprised read poor reviews site decided experience time stay disappointed hotel comfortable staff friendly accommodating ready arrived 11am held bags day day hesitation clean comfortable besides dont marais sit de la bastille 5min walk numerous shops restaurants cafes closer metro stpaul 3mins walk main line changes sites recommend hotel looking reasonably priced clean hotel fantastic location

Reviews.Title: “Accommodating staff in a character loaded and quirky hotel”

Reviews.Content: stayed hotel unexpectedly volcano disruption european airways booked directly website minute rate 59 euro fantastic welcoming arrived readily attempting speak english spite efforts speak french unique experience narrow entry corridor flanked bathroom separate shower stall modern sliding glass doors newly tiled outfitted chandelier divided rectangle rested partly shower unavoidably knocked tiny armoir unit fun delightfully odd keeping chandelier rectangle accommodated double bed thats tv suspended ceiling bracket ceilings didnt feel closed window centre courtyard shaft view clean sheets immaculate bed comfortable loaded character quirks staff helpful following day keeping luggage late afternoon stay short stay centre paris holiday unpack thats space fantastic safe vibrant noise night recommend affordable clean friendly hotel guests expect 5 star comforts stairs tiny spaces abound conscientious evident merci
